1)Sirasa super star dinanna thibune nilanthi dias. Meyata kisima talent ekak nehe, ayya wageema Sinhala/demala/english/bera/tabla/dool okkoma ekata anala therumak nethi vilambeethayak kiyala salli tikka hoyaganna hadanawa. Meya sirasa super star dinna welaawe meyage thaththa ali lokka wage wish karanna giya stage ekata, hariyata meya ge sahaja hekiyaawen dinna wage, me lankawe kavadada hariyata votes ganan karala weda karanne? Lol danna kiyana loku loku porawal walata kiyala, salli deela weda karanna ratak ne meeka. Ithin me talent show walin wedak nehe. Hodata super star beluwoth peenawa nilanthita hodata acting puluwan kiyala. (mama nilanthi a kadee yana kenek nemei). Meya ekka sirara super star eke netuwa thava thavath Sinhala hari hari amaaruwen katha karana mala holmanak, hasini kiyala. Ee geenith tv ekata awilla karapu interview dekala sansaaare kalakiruna. 2)Meyayi, meyage ayyayai , ayyage anith chakgoolaya, karapu hoda wedagath therumak thiyena Sinhala sinduwak thiyenawada? Lol 3)Meya bedapu geeni ta miss sri lanka dunna panel ekata ekko eyes penne nehe, nethnam me wage ketha geeniyek ta miss sri lanka deida? denna aththe thavath danna kiyana evunta kellage aya kiyala. Moona nikam assayek (horse) wage. Thava monawa kiyannada? 4)Mee wage thuttu deke, asaadhaarana samaajayak bihiweemata hethuwa mokakda?
umbata wena weda nedda ?  anunge 1,2,3, hoyanna kalin thamange diyunuwa gena bala ganin , ethakota ohoma rachana liyanna welawak enne na.

No Mr. Perera , I think apart from weddings that follow islamic traditions, most other ethnicities have big grand weddings that they take numerous loans and end up in a life time of debt. It is because they try to go over the top inorder to impress all their relatives and claim that they had their wedding and reception at a brand name hotel, instead of realizing the true purpose of a marriage. A wedding is it's own industry in Sri Lanka and their are numerous people who profit from the naiveness of the bride and groom
